page.title: 13Trade in Wragby
page.content:
{WRAGBY NEWSAGENT'S { In Wragby {Market Place}there is a { {newsagent's shop.}Six people work there.{All sorts of things are sold. As well as papers and magazines you can buy sweets,ice_creams and cigarettes,birthday cards, records, ornaments and jewellery.Tea, coffee and sugar are also stocked for emergencies.
Some girls and boys do paper rounds,delivering newspapers and magazines around the village.They take the{daily papers in the mornings}and deliver the{'Lincolnshire Echo'}in the evenings.
The shop has just opened a{video {club,}and stocks video films for hire.
